title: Ka Ladɔnniyali - Orbital Temple
heading: Aw ka ladɔnniya ni a wulila
description:
Nowanburukalo tile 28, san 2025, Orbital Temple bɛna wuli.
I ka e-mail bila, an bɛna a fɔ i ye ni a sera yɔrɔ la.

form.successMessage: An bɛna se aw ma ni a wulila.
form.errorMessage: Fɛn dɔ ma ɲɛ. Aw ye aw jija ka segin a kan.
